channel.title: Containerization on Rakesh
channel.description: Recent content in Containerization on Rakesh

item.title: LXC
item.description: Linux containers are light weight containers, whereas docker is application container. LXC were very useful for local testing and development. About lxd LXD is the utility through which we install and manage LXC Install LXC via snap snap install lxd For listing all available images in repository lxc image list images: Launch an LXC lxc launch ubuntu:focal --vm foreman-001 Connect to lxc container lxc exec foreman-001 -- bash login and allow permit root login here vim /etc/ssh/sshd_config
